</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the captive state of the given unit (set with [[setCaptive]]). A captive unit will not be attacked by its enemies.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Important</title><part><name index="1"/><value>
While a captive unit won't be attacked, it will still attack its enemies – be sure to [[setBehaviour]] "CARELESS" / [[removeAllWeapons]] accordingly.</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[captive]] object </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] - unit or vehicle </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if the unit is captive, [[false]] if not </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[captive]] _general) [[then]] { [[removeAllWeapons]] _general; };</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[captiveNum]], [[setCaptive]], [[side]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
